text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse TRUMP'S  Re-election  comes down to HAND SANITIZER! If folks don't have hand sanitizer; then COVID-19 continues to spread & TRUMP'S re-election prospects will be DEAD ON ARRIVAL. USE DEFENSE ACT TO MAKE HAND SANITIZER!
